casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Eugene MATTHEWS 28P18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 1, 2018

Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, For State of North Carolina.

Eugene Matthews, For Matthews, Eugene.

R. Andrew Murray, District Attorney, for the State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 22nd of January 2018 by Defendant to Demand Lower Appellate Court to Send Copy of Motion:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 1st of March 2018."
